channel.title: 508 Server - Doing Stuff With Objects
channel.description:
Hey. I went into the Downloads section and downloaded a semi-blank 508 server/client and am working on it. Now, I'm adding opening/closing doors. The only problem is, I don't know what stuff to write. If I try, I get dced (I've tried changing the y instead of rotating it.) Is there any chance someone can tell me what they write? Like, [i]writeByte(val)[/i]?
I'd prefer the data to write to actually rotate it.
Thanks,
~Lin
